column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We shared the Lou's small pizza and oh my gosh was it the best pizza I have ever eaten. It had spinach
column5: and we added sausage. And Of course we got it with the butter crust
column7: why not? After we ordered the server asked if we wanted an appetizer or salad because the pizza would take 45 minutes. We decided against a starter and I was regretting it about 20 minutes into the wait
column8: but once the food came out I was glad we had decided against it! Deep dish pizza is SO filling!
